title: Boaventura (Porto da)
body: At the mouth of the Porco or Boaventura stream, there is a rocky beach, adjacent to the small port of the same name. It is close to Ponta Delgada, less than a mile away.

Boaventura: Locality where the Porto da Boaventura is located
Ponta Delgada: Locality close to Porto da Boaventura
